Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description:
Who we are
Fueled by a fundamental belief that having access to financial services creates opportunity, PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL) is committed to democratizing financial services and empowering people and businesses to join and thrive in the global economy. Our open digital payments platform gives PayPal’s 277 million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways, whether they are online, on a mobile device, in an app, or in person. Through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships, PayPal creates better ways to manage and move money, and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments, paying or getting paid. Available in more than 200 markets around the world, the PayPal platform, including Braintree, Venmo and Xoom, enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than 100 currencies, withdraw funds in 56 currencies and hold balances in their PayPal accounts in 25 currencies.
When applying for a job you are required to create an account, if you have already created account - click Sign In.
Creating an account will allow you to follow the progress of your applications.
Note:
Provide full legal first Name/Family Name
DO: Capitalize first letter of First and Last Name. Example: John Smith
DON'T: Capitalize entire First and/or Last Name. Example: JOHN SMITH
NOTE: Use correct grammar for Names with multiple cases. Example: McDonald or O'Connell
Provide full address details
Resume is required
Multiple attachments can be uploaded including Resume and Cover Letter for each application

Job Description Summary:
At PayPal, we believe that now is the time to democratize financial services so that moving and managing money is a right for all citizens, not just the affluent. We are driven by this purpose, and we uphold our cultural values of collaboration, innovation, wellness and inclusion as our guide for making decisions and conducting business every day. It is our duty and privilege to be customer champions and put those we serve at the center of everything we do.

We are one team that respects and values diversity of thought for everyone, everywhere, and we actively seek to create an energizing workplace that brings out the best in all of us. If you are ready to shape the future of money, join the team at PayPal. We are proud to work here. You will be too.

Technology Platforms & Experiences (TPX) organization is the technology engine that powers PayPal’s business. We deliver a seamlessly scalable, exceptionally efficient, highly reliable infrastructure and services platform in a hybrid cloud environment. Thousands of PayPal developers build and run hundreds of applications processing billions of calls daily with high availability and reliability on our Java middleware framework products. As a team, we are active in the open source community, are proud of our systems knowledge, technology breadth, and intellectual curiosity. We are driven to empower PayPal developers in the best way possible.

PayPal seeks a self-driven, team player to join its Developer Platforms & Experiences (DPX) team. In this role, you’ll be an integral part of the developer experience team, working directly with Engineers, Architects, Product Managers, Program Managers and stakeholders to enable PayPal Dev workload on public clouds.

Primary responsibilities:

Work on in house applications written in Java, Node.js and Go.
You have a passion for building great developer experiences and have high energy and are capable of thriving in a high-paced and fun work environment.
You will be primarily responsible for building the infrastructure that is highly available and scalable.
You will utilize your experience and work in cloud technologies such as Docker, Mesos , Aurora, Hadoop/Storm, developer tools such as Jenkins and proprietary technologies to build the next generation of PayPal Development pipeline and build systems.
You will help pick machine learning algorithms to create smart metrics that will guide current and future investments.
Job Description:
A successful candidate will a strong engineer who is able to work in a high performing team, can creatively balance high quality delivery with customer focus to meet business needs, has excellent communication skills, and continuous record of delivering results in an aggressive and fast paced environment.
6+ years of experience planning, designing, developing and delivering software related to platforms
Hands on experience with design and development of scalable web services and platforms
Strong experience in some of the following technologies is highly desirable: Jenkins, Docker, Mesos, Aurora, Kubernetes, Hadoop/Storm/Spark, Java, Go, Node.js, MongoDB, Machine Learning and scripting
Understanding and experience with storage technologies such as NFS, Cinder,Swift, EBS and EFS is desirable.
Prior experience in building infrastructure for instrumenting, reporting, monitoring and alerting
Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to present complex technical information in a clear and concise manner to a variety of audiences.
Prior experience in AWS, GCE or Azure is a definite plus
BS in Computer Science or equivalent
Subsidiary:
PayPal
Travel Percent:
0
Primary Location:
Bangalore, Karnataka, India
Additional Locations:
Chennai
We're a purpose-driven company whose beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We hold ourselves to our One Team Behaviors which demand that we hold the highest ethical standards, to empower an open and diverse workplace, and strive to treat everyone who is touched by our business with dignity and respect. Our employees challenge the status quo, ask questions, and find solutions. We want to break down barriers to financial empowerment. Join us as we change the way the world defines financial freedom.

Title: Java Full Stack Developer / Core Java / HTML / Java Script /...
Description:
Requisition ID: 218026
Work Area: Software-Design and Development
Expected Travel: 0 - 10%
Career Status: Professional
Employment Type: Regular Full Time
COMPANY DESCRIPTION
SAP started in 1972 as a team of five colleagues with a desire to do something new. Together, they changed enterprise software and reinvented how business was done. Today, as a market leader in enterprise application software, we remain true to our roots. That’s why we engineer solutions to fuel innovation, foster equality and spread opportunity for our employees and customers across borders and cultures.
SAP values the entrepreneurial spirit, fostering creativity and building lasting relationships with our employees. We know that a diverse and inclusive workforce keeps us competitive and provides opportunities for all. We believe that together we can transform industries, grow economics, lift up societies and sustain our environment. Because it’s the best-run businesses that make the world run better and improve people’s lives.
JOB TITLE: Developer - Cloud HCM Analytics Team
PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES:
At SAP SuccessFactors we have started a Human Revolution. Using the latest technology, we are unlocking human potential and transforming our customer’s workforces in ways they never imagined. We are digitally transforming their businesses into the next generation of intelligent enterprises. Because people are at the heart of every business transformation and people are the heart of our business. The SAP SuccessFactors product suite spans core human resources and payroll, analytics-based hiring and customized onboarding, continuous performance management, intelligent succession and more. We operate the largest HCM Cloud in the world, supporting over 120 million users with over a billion transactions for customers across 26 industries in over 90 countries. Our co-located agile teams have end-to-end ownership of product, design, development, release, user assistance, and cloud operations capabilities. We are looking for the best talent to join our team and deliver continuous innovations in the cloud while bringing purpose to their lives and more meaning to their work. Join us today and become a part of the Human Revolution.
ABOUT THE TEAM
The Cloud HCM Analytics team builds the analytics solution on top of world’s biggest cloud-based enterprise application which has unique challenge in building a common solution that should be customizable for more than 4,450 across 60 industries in over 177 countries and scalable for 50 million users usage. We are responsible for building operational reporting solutions, as well as cutting edge analytical solutions. This team provides ample opportunities to interact with various stake holders and come of the best solution and implement the same with support for highly customizable and scalable approach. Current development activities involved in make use of Predictive Analytics, Machine learning and Artificial Intelligence. We have ambitious road map to start working on Prescriptive analytics.
Position Overview
Developers should be able to work as a Full stack developer with specialized either in UI or back end. Design highly scalable and performant solution which address functional as well as nonfunctional requirement with high quality.
Full stack developer – willing and capable of handling both client and server development
End to end responsibility – take care of your feature from requirements to deployment
Collaborate well – demonstrate excellent development practices, share and motivate others.
This development role provides immense potential for growth. The potential candidate would work closely with other members of the team and other functional groups within SAP SuccessFactors
SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES
Strong technical skills with technologies like Java/J2EE, Hibernate, Spring, SAP HANA, UI Technologies and OData protocols to develop modem cutting edge software that performs and scales in cloud environment
Server oriented - Knowledge in Java backend development (tomcat, JEE, dependency injection, and more) – mandatory
At least basic client-side knowledge of Web technologies, JS, HTML, CSS – mandatory.
Sound knowledge in Object Oriented Programming Principles, Design Patterns and Software Architecture, especially in new age Cloud solutions
Must be able to design and implement across all layers of the software (UI, Backend, Database)
Exposure to debugging, troubleshooting and performance tuning for complex SQL queries
Knowledge of lean development infrastructure process including Git, TeamCity, Jenkins etc. and exposure to Continuous Delivery practices
Exposure to building Analytical and report modelling for highly customizable Enterprise cloud-based SaaS application
Working knowledge of Scrum, Test Driven Development and passionate about unit test, integrity testing, stress testing and performance testing and test automation
Exposure to building large scale application deployed on public cloud like AWS, AZURE etc ..
EDUCATION, WORK EXPERIENCE AND QUALIFICATIONS
BE/B.Tech, ME/M.Tech, MCA with 60% aggregate across.
Strong educational qualifications (Engineering majors, MCA from reputed institutes)
4-8 years of professional experience in developing Java/J2EE based enterprise web-based application,
Outstanding written and verbal communication skills.
Bachelor’s in Computer Science required, Master preferred.
#SAPSFSF

WHAT YOU GET FROM US
Success is what you make it. At SAP, we help you make it your own. A career at SAP can open many doors for you. If you’re searching for a company that’s dedicated to your ideas and individual growth, recognizes you for your unique contributions, fills you with a strong sense of purpose, and provides a fun, flexible and inclusive work environment – apply now.
SAP'S DIVERSITY COMMITMENT
To harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the unique competencies that each person brings to the company.
SAP is committed to the principles of Equal Employment Opportunity and to providing reasonable accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team (Americas: Careers.NorthAmerica@sap.com or Careers.LatinAmerica@sap.com, APJ: Careers.APJ@sap.com, EMEA: Careers@sap.com).

Title: All levels-All locations-Data Science AI-Referral
Description:
SCAM ALERT: Caution against fraudulent job offers!
More Info

×

SCAM ALERT
Caution against fraudulent job offers!

We have been informed of instances where jobseekers are led to believe of fictitious job opportunities with Deloitte India (“Deloitte”). In one or more such cases, false promises of actual or potential selection, or initiation or completion of the recruitment formalities appear to have been or are being made. Some jobseekers appear to have been asked to pay money to specified bank accounts of individuals or entities as a condition of their selection for a ‘job’ with Deloitte. These individuals or entities are in no way connected with Deloitte and do not represent or otherwise act on behalf of Deloitte.


At Deloitte, ethics and integrity are fundamental and not negotiable.
We are against corruption and neither offer bribes nor accept them, nor induce or permit any other party to make or receive bribes on our behalf.
We have not authorised any party or person to collect any money from jobseekers in any form whatsoever for promises of getting jobs in Deloitte.
We consider candidates only on merit and that we provide an equal opportunity to eligible applicants.
No one other than an authorised official of Deloitte is permitted to confirm any job offer from Deloitte.
Anyone who at any time has made or makes any payment to any party against promises of job or selection for a job with Deloitte or any matter related to this (including those for ‘registration’, ‘verification’ or ‘security deposit’) or otherwise engages with any such person who has made or makes fraudulent promises or offers, does so (or has done so) entirely at their own risk. Deloitte takes no responsibility or liability for any such unauthorised or fraudulent actions or engagements.
We encourage jobseekers to exercise caution. If you have queries about the veracity of a job offer you have received which relates to Deloitte or would like to report a fraud with regard to job offers with Deloitte, please send an email to inhiringalert@deloitte.com

Scikit-learn, pandas and other python data sciences libraries

Title: Software Engineer
Description:
RSi is a leading provider of retail data science based analytics and a big data management platform which helps top retailers and CPG companies manage their supply chain and marketing initiatives to drive sales results. Using machine learning, streaming analytics and predictive models, we are the go-to cloud based; peta-scale SaaS data management platform in the retail industry.
Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
Work with customer support, production operations and developers to troubleshoot customer problems.
Debug complex software to identify bugs and recommend fixes to dev teams.
Work with QA organization to test hot fixes and releases.
Provide 3rd level support and resolve issues related to installations, implementation, deployment, functionality and usage of all RSi products.
Conducts technical training and assist co-workers.
Maintains and Expands working knowledge of all RSi products.
Help with Incident troubleshooting root cause analysis. Identify changes and differences that caused an incident, or predict which ones will impact future issues.
Assist other engineering and development teams to resolve application to platform integration / deployment / scalability issues for both IaaS and PaaS cloud services.
As part of a global support team triage and remediate public cloud infrastructure / deployment issues and assist with application support engagements as needed.
Qualifications:
M.S. Degree in CS/Mathematics/Statistics/Engineering is preferred. B.S degree will be considered with substantial support experience.
2-3 years of experience as developer/QA/Support Engineer.
Highly organized, with an ability to prioritize time sensitive assignments.
Strong analytical and technical skills and demonstrated ability to creatively solve complex problems
Experience working with Microsoft BI tools (Power BI ..) is a big plus.
Strong data warehouse background supporting terabytes of data.
Excellent SQL knowledge.
Experience with Linux, Scripting (Powershell or AzureCLI, CLI, Bash) is required.
Prior development experience in Python or Java in Linux environment is a plus.
Working knowledge of using monitoring, logging tools (Prometheus, EFK stack) to identify application performance issues and incident troubleshooting.
Experience in deploying and supporting enterprise software applications is a plus.
Understanding of modern, cloud native applications, micro-services and Cloud Operations.
Experience with Container technologies such as Docker, Kubernetes and the Kubernetes cluster management tools (kubectl, kubeadm...) is highly desired.
Understanding of DevOps and Continuous Integration/Deployment in the cloud is important.
Experience with Microsoft Azure is a plus.
Willing to learn and adopt the new technologies quickly.
ABOUT RETAIL SOLUTIONS, INC.:
Retail Solutions, Inc. ("RSi") develops and delivers a comprehensive suite of award-winning software-as-a-service (SaaS) solutions that turn Retailer "downstream data", such as point-of-sale (POS), supply chain, merchandiser feedback and category data, into actionable visibility into the store and onto the shelf for their suppliers.
RSi, the largest and fastest-growing company in the Retail Execution Management field, has more experience with processing customer-specific retailer data than any other company. Retailers and consumer product goods (CPG) companies trust Retail Solutions to grow sales, reduce out-of-stocks, improve promotion execution and effectiveness, maximize retail operation productivity and foster collaborative relationships in the retail industry to improve product availability for the end-consumer.
RSi serves more than 500 CPG Companies, including 23 of the top 25 global consumer goods companies, and processes data from more than 175 leading retailers in the Americas and Europe.
Retail Solutions, Inc. is headquartered in Mountain View, CA and has offices in Providence, RI, Bentonville, AR, Minneapolis, MN, Chicago, IL, Brentford, UK, Munich, Germany, Pune, India, and Shanghai, China. RSi is an equal opportunity employer.
To learn more about our Privacy Policy, visit our website at https://www.retailsolutions.com/privacy-policy/.

Title: Data Scientist

What will you be doing?

Resolution and linking, knowledge base curation, machine translation, information retrieval and others

Who are we looking for?

MS/M. Tech or BE with 3+ years of experience in Data Science, Machine Learning or NLP

Experience of working on production-grade machine learning-based solutions would be a plus

Prior publication record at AI/ML conferences would be a plus

Given a DS/ML problem, hypothesize, iterate and evaluate solution options

Good communication skills and ability to work with stakeholders across business, PM, and Engineering

Excitement & curiosity around data in general “Hacker” attitude with “go-getter” mind-set

Comfort with Math and Statistics

Broad understanding of Machine Learning techniques

Very good coding skills in any of these languages: R, Python, Matlab, Java, C and Machine Learning libraries like scipy, numpy, pyspark, tensorflow etc

Basic knowledge of Big Data stack: Spark, Cassandra, Map-Reduce, S3

Prior experience with start-up environment preferred
Ready to join Clustr?

Title: Senior Java Developer
Description:
Senior Java Developer

Job Description:

At Micro Focus, everything we do is based on a simple idea: The fastest way to get results is to build on what you have. Our software solutions enable organizations to do just that. Secure and scalable, with analytics built in, they bridge the gap between existing and emerging IT—fast-tracking digital transformations across DevOps, Hybrid IT, Security, and Predictive Analytics. In the race to innovate, Micro Focus customers have the clear advantage.
Our portfolio spans the following areas: DevOps | IT Operations| Cloud | Security | Info Governance | Big Data, Machine Learning, & Analytics
Product Brief:
Advanced Authentication Framework (AA) is the most seamless and universal authentication solution that supports a multitude of advanced authentication technologies and devices. AA is based on industry standards to allow the widest variety of authentication methods and technologies to be easily used at any time authentication is needed in an organization.
AA provides authentication, authorization, and auditing functionality, as well as centralized administration services. It is a scalable, customizable, and modular software package that can fully integrate with an organizations environment.
Looking for a Senior Java Developer with deep knowledge of JavaScript (JS), Web Services, OAuth and SAML. The Developer will be responsible for developing Single Sign-on using OSP (One SSO Provider) which uses technologies like OAuth/OpenID connect & SAML2. The Developer will also be responsible for other Java based components in Advanced Authentication. The server business logic is written in Python and UI in JavaScript. Would expect the developer to have basic understanding of Python so that the SSO functionality can be integrated with the Server. The developer is required to work on both the business logic and UI parts of the server components.
He/she will gather Business requirements and is responsible for the end to end development of product capabilities, which includes Design, Implementation and Unit Testing. He/she need to ensure that the deliverables are of high quality. He/she needs to interact with the test members, documentation and Technical support to take the product to the customers. He/she needs to work with Technical support team
Responsibilities:
Use-case identification: Understand the requirement and formulate customer use cases that can be used as reference during implementation and testing of the features.
Engineering Requirement gathering: Analyze the customer requirement and come up with engineering requirements.
Architecture and Design: Based on the requirement and use cases, come up with Architecture and Design to meet the customer expectation.
Lead and perform in-depth and thorough testing of the owned features/areas. Maintain the test cases and test results in test management system. Maintain the defects in defect Management system. Plan and realize the test environment, platforms, test cycles and regression cycles based on the strategy and quality evaluation at different stages of the product.
Process adherence and Deliverable ownership: Make sure to follow the required development process at all stages and deliver on the committed time. Take the responsibility to develop high quality product.
Customer support: Analyze customer defects and provide them fix in a timely manner. Perform root cause analysis to identify and own the improvement areas.
Technical expertise: Develop excellent knowledge about the domain, overall product, deployment scenarios. Keep upto date with technologies and development tools.
Should guide junior members in performing their activities effectively and help them develop technical skills.
Education and Experience Required:
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent.
Typically 6-12 years experience
Knowledge and Skills:
Should have 6+ years of experience in using Java & JavaScript(JS)
Should have good understanding of Web Services - REST APIs, HTTP, OAuth, OpenID connect, SAML, etc.
Should have good understanding of NGINX/Tomcat, HTML & CSS.
Need to understand and integrate with modules written in Python.
Good understanding of containerization is an added advantage.
Should have ability to work with GIT or other Distributed Version Control Systems (DVCS)
Should have understanding of Test Driven Development (TDD) and have the ability to develop unit tests

Position Title: Senior Data Science Analyst, BI

General Summary:
Senior Data Science Analyst will be part of Business Analytics team and as a Senior Data Science Analyst, you will work and apply your knowledge and skills in designing, development & deployment of Cognitive advanced analytics statistical models, machine learning methods and solutions for internal and external global CommScope business users across various domains. Uses statistical and other tools/languages - R, Python, Java, Haddop,Scala,IOT, Visual Inspection deep learning algorithms and Azure IOT&ML to design and deliver end-to-end Advanced Analytics solutions.
Ensure Advanced solutions are scalable, reliable, and trust worthy for decision makers. Works as a subject matter expert in assigned functional areas. Based on business problems and user personas data scientist develop, conceptualize and test Various Statistical models and deliver strategic advanced analytics projects from design to execution

Duties & Responsibilities:
Design and develop actionable Advanced Analytical solutions that provide insights to decision makers
Profeciency in Data identification,prepration, data mining, integrating data from different sources structured and unstructured, and write machine learning and deep learning algorithms
Identifies what data is available and relevant, including internal and external data sources, leveraging new data collection processes such as IOT, Visual inspection or social media.
Analyze simulation results, Designs experiments, test hypotheses, and build models.
Leads discovery processes with stakeholders to identify the business problems, requirements, opportunities and the expected outcome.
Collaborates with Business users and Enggners and subject matter experts to select the relevant sources of information.Makes strategic recommendations on data collection, integration and retention requirements incorporating business requirements and knowledge of best practices.
Proficiency in developeing solutions using statistical and other tools/languages like R, Python, Java, Haddop,Scala,IOT, Visual Inspection deep learning algorithms and Azure IOT&ML
Develops innovative and effective approaches to solve analytics problems and communicates results and methodologies.
Analyze the solution impact on existing systems and process, and work with various teams to finalize the scope and depth of testing required for production deployment.
Deliver projects by authoring/reviewing solution design, functional design, technical design, and test sets and collaborate with global teams in delivery.
Analyze customer requests for feasibility, Develop project scope, schedule, and resource estimates, adhering to company software development methodology and standards. Prepare project status reports and present project status reports to project stake holders.
Proactively work with business users and source system analysts to understand and gain expertise in business process and data relationships.
Work with security team to secure the data. Work with the System, Database, and Application Administrators to ensure that application performs within the defined performance parameters.
Set up and Adhere to the organizational development process and standards.
Proactively recommend and implement enhancements and/or upgrades and ensure that architecture and technology standards are in place.

Related Education & Experience:
Bachelor’s in related curriculum such as Information Systems, Data Science and Statistis with w/ 5-8 Years experience in Advanced Analytics using Machine learning and Statistical modeling is preferable.

SKILLS REQUIRED:
Include demonstrated competencies and physical, mental, & interpersonal skills.
Ability to design complex systems and translate user requirements into business solutions.
Experience in interviewing business users, collecting and interpreting requirements, explaining the solution details to business audience and run business meetings.
Proven understanding of data mining, statistical analysis and predictive analysis concepts.
Build simulation models using different programing languages and vendor tools to model business problems in support of decision-making.
Work on tools and technologies such as R,Python,Vision inspection deep learning algorithms, SPAS, Java, Haddop,Scala and Azure ML and IOT
Hands on experience developing statistical and predictive models in the context of IOT based Manfacturing Operations,predictive maintenance, Visual inspection based Quality improvement and process optimisation, Sales and Marketing basket analysis with structured and unstructured data.
Ability to analyze simulation results, develop technical reports and presentations and guide business and technical leaders on suitable data analysis strategy.
Should be passionate about data science and technology, and stay abreast with industry trend and technology roadmap in the areas of Machine Learning, Big Data and Data Science.
A process- oriented, Continuous process improvement driven, with strong project management skills.
Must be able to effectively communicate and manage global development teams.

Title: Lead Engineer
Description:
Description:
Help us keep Target safe and secure
We want YOU to be the next Video Surveillance Engineer to join our talented team. You’ll help us maintain and enhance thousands of servers, IP cameras, and software configurations that Target employees use daily to watch live and recorded surveillance footages. You’ll have an opportunity to build a large scale, geographically distributed video surveillance solution, building video analytics systems and work with our business partners to shape the future of video surveillance at Target. As a Lead Engineer, you will work closely with Product Owner and Dev team in a geographically distributed location (Minneapolis and Bangalore) in building a high performing, cutting edge and highly scalable product. The key to the success of this position is having strong & innovative approach to problem solving, great technical leadership, excellent communication (written and verbal, formal and informal), flexibility, and a self-motivated working style with attention to details.
Our team exists to keep Target safe and secure for our guests. Our systems are the first deterrent against criminal activity and are a key tool in high profile security incidents and weather crises. Our work enables assets protection staff, store leaders, store operations, Target’s National Investigation Center, and our state-of-the-art forensic labs.
Come Join us!
Job brief
We are looking for an engineer who wants to be part of a team building high-performing, scalable, enterprise-grade surveillance applications. Our new team member will be part of our DevOps culture building new solutions around our existing platform and developing the replacement that aligns with Target’s technology direction of Java, CI/CD, Containers and Open source. The engineer in this role will help us improve our world class, retail leading surveillance system with new technologies and an emphasis on using the video beyond traditional loss prevention. The team is exploring video analytics and machine learning as way to provide new value from the surveillance system.
Responsibilities
Use your skills, experience and talents to be a part of groundbreaking thinking and visionary goals. As a Lead engineer primarily you’ll take the lead as you…
Understand Target's business and technical environments. Assist teams in resolving complex business challenges via technical solutions.
Be a significant code contributor, manage overall software development cycle, drive best practices and ensuring development of high quality code
Drive resolution of technology roadblocks including code, infrastructure, build and deployment with a strong sense of ownership
Experience in leading Teams in technologies, frameworks, design patterns, processes and guiding values of the domain architecture
Ensure all code adheres to all platform, development, compliance & security standards
Build and manage enterprise scale video management solutions against deadlines.
Practitioner of rapid prototyping and Agile, DevOps, CI/CD, test-driven development.
Stay current with new technology and be able to assesses to determine viability and applicability to Target's business and technical environments
Lead development/ operations in a geographically distributed team within local site scrum team
Be a great team player, mentor team members and help build a team of high caliber software development engineers
Qualifications & Skillset
BS/ MS degree in computer science or equivalent
8+ years of hands-on experience in Java/ Springboot/ Node/ Python language & framework with at least one full cycle implementation from requirement to production.
Extensive experience working in an agile environment (i.e. user stories, iterative development, etc.)
Full stack engineering with agile and innovative mindset
Experience in building/implementing high performance & scalable server-side applications
Worked upon architecture and development principles around Open source, DevOps, Agile, Containerization and Virtualized Infrastructure
Strong written and verbal communication skills with the ability to present complex technical information in a clear and concise manner to variety of audiences
Added Advantage
Video Solutions experience with a track record of innovation
Implemented or understanding of Video Management Solutions, Video Codecs and exposure to open source libraries
Basic knowledge of networking concepts
Interest and experience in Machine learning, deep learning, NLP and Internet of Things (IOT) is valuable.

Title: Java Full Stack Developer / Core Java / HTML / Java Script /...
Description:
Requisition ID: 218729
Work Area: Software-Design and Development
Expected Travel: 0 - 10%
Career Status: Professional
Employment Type: Regular Full Time
COMPANY DESCRIPTION
SAP started in 1972 as a team of five colleagues with a desire to do something new. Together, they changed enterprise software and reinvented how business was done. Today, as a market leader in enterprise application software, we remain true to our roots. That’s why we engineer solutions to fuel innovation, foster equality and spread opportunity for our employees and customers across borders and cultures.
SAP values the entrepreneurial spirit, fostering creativity and building lasting relationships with our employees. We know that a diverse and inclusive workforce keeps us competitive and provides opportunities for all. We believe that together we can transform industries, grow economics, lift up societies and sustain our environment. Because it’s the best-run businesses that make the world run better and improve people’s lives.
JOB TITLE: Developer - Cloud HCM Analytics Team
PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES:
At SAP SuccessFactors we have started a Human Revolution. Using the latest technology, we are unlocking human potential and transforming our customer’s workforces in ways they never imagined. We are digitally transforming their businesses into the next generation of intelligent enterprises. Because people are at the heart of every business transformation and people are the heart of our business. The SAP SuccessFactors product suite spans core human resources and payroll, analytics-based hiring and customized onboarding, continuous performance management, intelligent succession and more. We operate the largest HCM Cloud in the world, supporting over 120 million users with over a billion transactions for customers across 26 industries in over 90 countries. Our co-located agile teams have end-to-end ownership of product, design, development, release, user assistance, and cloud operations capabilities. We are looking for the best talent to join our team and deliver continuous innovations in the cloud while bringing purpose to their lives and more meaning to their work. Join us today and become a part of the Human Revolution.
ABOUT THE TEAM
The Cloud HCM Analytics team builds the analytics solution on top of world’s biggest cloud-based enterprise application which has unique challenge in building a common solution that should be customizable for more than 4,450 across 60 industries in over 177 countries and scalable for 50 million users usage. We are responsible for building operational reporting solutions, as well as cutting edge analytical solutions. This team provides ample opportunities to interact with various stake holders and come of the best solution and implement the same with support for highly customizable and scalable approach. Current development activities involved in make use of Predictive Analytics, Machine learning and Artificial Intelligence. We have ambitious road map to start working on Prescriptive analytics.
Position Overview
Developers should be able to work as a Full stack developer with specialized either in UI or back end. Design highly scalable and performant solution which address functional as well as nonfunctional requirement with high quality.
Full stack developer – willing and capable of handling both client and server development
End to end responsibility – take care of your feature from requirements to deployment
Collaborate well – demonstrate excellent development practices, share and motivate others.
This development role provides immense potential for growth. The potential candidate would work closely with other members of the team and other functional groups within SAP SuccessFactors
SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES
Strong technical skills with technologies like Java/J2EE, Hibernate, Spring, SAP HANA, UI Technologies and OData protocols to develop modem cutting edge software that performs and scales in cloud environment
Server oriented - Knowledge in Java backend development (tomcat, JEE, dependency injection, and more) – mandatory
At least basic client-side knowledge of Web technologies, JS, HTML, CSS – mandatory.
Sound knowledge in Object Oriented Programming Principles, Design Patterns and Software Architecture, especially in new age Cloud solutions
Must be able to design and implement across all layers of the software (UI, Backend, Database)
Exposure to debugging, troubleshooting and performance tuning for complex SQL queries
Knowledge of lean development infrastructure process including Git, TeamCity, Jenkins etc. and exposure to Continuous Delivery practices
Exposure to building Analytical and report modelling for highly customizable Enterprise cloud-based SaaS application
Working knowledge of Scrum, Test Driven Development and passionate about unit test, integrity testing, stress testing and performance testing and test automation
Exposure to building large scale application deployed on public cloud like AWS, AZURE etc ..
EDUCATION, WORK EXPERIENCE AND QUALIFICATIONS
BE/B.Tech, ME/M.Tech, MCA with 60% aggregate across.
Strong educational qualifications (Engineering majors, MCA from reputed institutes)
4-8 years of professional experience in developing Java/J2EE based enterprise web-based application,
Outstanding written and verbal communication skills.
Bachelor’s in Computer Science required, Master preferred.
#SAPSFSF
WHAT YOU GET FROM US
Success is what you make it. At SAP, we help you make it your own. A career at SAP can open many doors for you. If you’re searching for a company that’s dedicated to your ideas and individual growth, recognizes you for your unique contributions, fills you with a strong sense of purpose, and provides a fun, flexible and inclusive work environment – apply now.
SAP'S DIVERSITY COMMITMENT
To harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the unique competencies that each person brings to the company.
SAP is committed to the principles of Equal Employment Opportunity and to providing reasonable accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. Title: Machine Learning Researcher ( Consumer)
Description:
Oyo Machine Learning Researcher

OYO is hiring at all levels for its Machine learning and Data science team!


Who we are?


Launched in 2013, OYO is India’s largest branded network of hotels. Its network currently spans over 200 Indian cities including all major metros, regional commercial hubs, leisure destinations, and key pilgrimage towns. The company’s vision is to become the most preferred and trusted hotel brand in the world.
OYO was founded by Ritesh Agarwal, the first resident Asian to be accepted to the Thiel Fellowship (started by Paypal founder Peter Thiel). He recently featured in the Forbes 30 under 30 lists in the global, Indian and Asian edition under the Consumer Tech category. OYO is backed by the world’s leading investors including the Softbank Group, Lightspeed Venture Partners India, Sequoia Capital and Greenoaks Capital. In August 2015, it was identified as among the “50 next start-up unicorns” by New York Times. It has also received acclaim and accolades such as Startup of the Year Express IT Award, Quest Experience Award for Best Use of Social Media for CX Improvement, NDTV Dream Chaser of the Year, Lufthansa ET Now Runway to Success Award, TIE Lumis Business Excellence Award and India International Travel Mart Award. Ritesh received the Business World Young Entrepreneur Award in 2015. He recently featured in the Forbes 30 under 30 lists (Global, India, Asia) under the Consumer Tech category.
Oyo is rapidly growing and that means that we are looking for people who can not only bring incremental change to the system but change the state of the play itself!
Some of the problems we are working are involve how a particular booking will pan out post booking (or pre-booking, can we do that? ) and suggest remedial measures to make the user experience better, dynamic pricing, better and personalised search results for users, fraud detection and demand prediction to name a few!
For us the customer is everything and we will stop at nothing to make their stay the best experience! We strongly believe that machine learning can help transform this experience for the user. By knowing what the user likes and does not like, we can provide user a unique unparalleled experience. This we believe has the potential to change the paradigm of the hospitality industry.

If the above problem statement excites you, then believe us when we say - we have not even scratched the surface yet!

Our process of joining the team is very simple. We look for people who
Are as motivated and crazy as we are.
Have a strong machine learning background of either theoretical or practical or the right mix of both!
Think not in binary but in the data world!
Know how to run experiments and objectively evaluate the results!
Have Strong computer science and engineering fundamentals
Are ready to get their hands dirty and ensure that their code breathes in the live production environment.
Who know 42 ( or at-least get the joke!)

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
Role & Responsibilities:
Work with stakeholders throughout the organization to identify opportunities for leveraging company data to drive business solutions.

Data mining/ text mining from structured, semi-structure and unstructured data sources.

Building visualization platforms for data analytics solutions for engineering.
Defining the data accumulation mechanisms for cases where such mechanisms are not in place but are required by the business.
Develop custom data models and algorithms to apply to data sets.
Use predictive modelling to increase and optimize customer experiences, quick design solutions and other business outcomes.
Develop testing framework and test model quality.
Coordinate with different functional teams to implement models and monitor outcomes.
Develop processes and tools to monitor and analyse model performance and data accuracy.


Education:
Master’s degree in Computer Science Engineering with relevant experience in the field of Machine Learning, Deep Learning and Operations Research.
Bachelor/Master’s degree in Statistics, Mathematics, with relevant experience in the field of Machine Learning, Deep Learning and Operations Research.
Experience:
Minimum 6-8 years of experience in an industrial environment or product development

Technical skills:
Hands on experience with statistical tools and techniques
Expert level coding experience in C/C++, R, Octave and Python
Good knowledge about Digital image processing, Computer graphics algorithms

Good exposure to Big Data related technology stack (HDFS, Hue, Cloudera, Spark),
Should be able to read research papers and pick ideas to quickly implement/augment the current solution

Title: Software Engineer - AI Applied Research
Description:
Software Engineer - AI Applied Research
(Job Number: 1907314)
Fidelity Global Services is an engine that powers the creation of successful business outcomes across all of Fidelity through global sites in Ireland, China, India and Poland. Comprising over 8000 customer centric associates, skilled in multiple disciplines, GS is focusing on its AI driven automation talent to automate business processes or IT operation to bring in more efficiency in the system.
We have access to years of data, a mix of seasoned practitioners and brilliant recruits and an amazing treasure trove of business opportunities to attend to across all of Fidelity’s diverse businesses.
This is what we know before you join our team. You will be able to expand on this treasure trove to glean new compelling stories by means of applying cutting edge research in the areas of NLP/NLU/NLG to build capabilities/products.

This requirement is for Global Automation Accelerator, which is part of Vitality for GS. Charter of GAA is to create machine re-engineered processes, to deliver value to the organization by embedding data driven intelligence into business processes or IT operations and deliver newer customer experiences. This position is for an ML Engineering role in AI Applied Research.

What you bring to the table
A passion to help our business meet their goals through structured and unstructured data exploration, building Machine Learning or Deep Learning models, evaluate and embed the model into the application.
Strong programming experience in Python and awareness about the ecosystem.
Good understanding of Natural Language Processing (NLP), Understanding (NLU) and Generation (NLG).
Experience with open source ML frameworks: TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch. You should have fundamental knowledge in any of these.
Good understanding of mathematics (linear algebra, differential equations, optimization, linear programming, gradient descent, backpropagation)
Understanding of statistics
We would also consider if you have good background and experience with Reinforcement Learning or Adversarial Machine Learning.
Hands on experience with supervised/unsupervised ML algorithms and Deep Learning algorithms ( like FF Neural Networks, RNNs, LSTMs, MemN2N, ConvNet, GRUs, Deep Belief Networks, Attention and it’s variants etc.), Semi-supervised techniques and advanced ML learning procedures
Experience in speech or image is also helpful, but not necessary.
Publications/patents in the field of data science, ML or AI.
Good to have experience with some of the Graph DBs: Spark's GraphX, Neo4j/Cypher, Cayley, uRika, Blazegraph, Aster, Google's Knowledge Graph, etc or Semantic Web tools such as OWL/SPARQL.
A keen competitive spirit – the desire to be the best and ability to learn continuously
A Graduate or Masters or PhD in Engineering, Computer Science, Mathematics, Computational Statistics, Operations Research, Machine Learning, Mathematics, Physics – demonstrating the ability to persevere in a course of study
The Value you add
The ability to apply advanced mathematical intuition to design and develop novel methodologies and algorithms.
You are able to help the team articulate the tough questions and persistently tackle them.
You are a proven change agent delivering top quality solutions by getting the most from a team of technologists of all levels
You know how to build feedback loops to ensure that your algorithms can be trained and provide feedback to perform optimally.
Your innate curiosity will elicit new techniques to take abstract information and make sense of it through continuous experimentation.
Your ability to thrive on enjoy learning new strategies and taking on new challenges motivates your colleagues to do the same
Prior Work Experience: 2-12 years of professional experience of working on various ML/DL based solution.

Fidelity Investments is one of the world's largest providers of financial services. Headquartered in Boston, US, Fidelity's goal is to make financial expertise broadly accessible and effective in helping people live the lives they want. Privately held for nearly 70 years, Fidelity employs 45,000 associates who are focused on the long-term success of our customers. FMR (Fidelity Management & Research) India is the Global Inhouse Center of Fidelity Investments. Headquartered at Bangalore, where operations commenced in 2003, FMR India has another fully-functional unit at Chennai. To know more visit: FMR India

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
Job Summary
Job Description
What we have to offer: -
1. 25%+ raise over current salary
2. Work from anywhere in the world, full time permanent job
3. Flexible working hours
The Role
We are at the leading edge in leveraging phones cameras to assess sports skill mastery. When we automate the collection and assessment of skill performance data, we maintain data objectivity, consistency and accuracy in powering leaderboards and athletes profiles. We can also seamlessly curate the next appropriate battery of workouts to keep the athlete both challenged and continuously improving. The role you will play is to help commercialize our working prototypes into simple, elegant and delightful mobile app user experiences. The opportunity and challenge is to adapt our already-impressive capabilities in basketball across multiple sports thirteen to be exact! In a nutshell, you will develop reliable object and motion tracking technology to measure an athletes performance/progress and work with iOS and Android developers to implement algorithms on mobile devices.
Responsibilities:
- Design, develop, deploy machine learning algorithms for the assessment of individual sports skill mastery delivered within a 100% mobile user experience.
- Create innovative algorithms beyond textbook recipes to automate assessment of skill mastery across multiple sports using the phones camera and microphone.
- Object detection is just the starting point. On top of that you will leverage sensor fusion to powerfully impact assessing an athletes game.
- Finally, you will have a full impact on affecting an elegant and simple user interface delivering real time workout feedback that motivates and delights our athletes.
Preferred Qualifications
- 5 yrs experience BSC, Statistics, EE, Math
- or 2 yrs experience with MS, Statistics, EE, Math-
- Demonstrable expertise in Signals processing (time and spectral domain, Kalman filters, time series analysis)
- Demonstrable expertise in Statistics (multivariate regression, Bayesian analysis, HMM)
- Demonstrable expertise in Image processing (Object detection and tracking, motion detection, image segmentation)
- Demonstrable expertise in Machine learning (classification, few-shot learning, mobile platforms)
- Demonstrated programming ability (Python, Matlab, C++)
Familiarity with OpenCV, Audio processing libraries and deep learning libraries (TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch) a plus.
Job Type: Full-time
Experience:
work: 1 year (Preferred)
Education:
Secondary(10th Pass) (Preferred)

Title: AI Scientist
Description:
An AI scientist at Wadhwani AI will build research-driven solutions to bring AI to the benefit of the underserved billions across the developing world.

ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES

As an AI scientist, you will be responsible for building machine learning solutions to problems of societal importance, and mentoring other team members in this effort. You will participate in problem definitions and the development and execution of algorithms and solutions to the problems.

In order to apply machine learning and related technologies for social good, you will need to understand user challenges and their context, curate and transform data, train and validate models, run simulations and broadly derive insights from data. In doing so, you will work in cross-functional teams spanning research, engineering, product and program management, and designers. You will also work closely with social sector organizations, and are encouraged to collaborate with researchers across the world.

You will be encouraged to drive fundamental advances to the technology domains themselves as part of the efforts towards their application, present your work in technical and other forums of interest, and publish in leading conferences and journals.

At Wadhwani AI, excellence as an individual contributor goes hand-in-hand with good teamwork and collaboration. You will mentor junior researchers, post-docs and interns, and participate in recruiting and hiring activities. You will also be expected to interact with external partners of Wadhwani AI when required, and to make periodic visits to the communities from where challenges are derived and where the solutions will be deployed.

REQUIREMENTS

We are looking for AI scientists with experience applying AI, machine learning and data science to real world problems. Ideal candidates should have a strong research background and be adept at a variety of data mining/analysis methods and tools, building and implementing models, visualizing data, creating/using algorithms and running simulations.

Candidates should be comfortable working with cross-functional teams, must have excellent communication skills and a track record of driving projects to completion.

Candidates should care about using their technical skills to solve large societally important problems.
Masters/PhD in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Physics, Economics or a relevant quantitative field from a leading institution in India or abroad.
Excellent track record of innovation as evinced by publications, patents, and products/solutions created.
Good communication skills and a collaborative mindset.
Work experience in academia or industry is desirable.
Apply with a CV/resume and a short email explaining your interest to careers@wadhwaniai.org.

Title: Software-Senior Engineer(CPQ Architect)
Description:
About Telstra
Telstra is Australia’s leading telecommunications and technology company, with operations in more than 20 countries, including in India where we’re building a new Innovation and Capability Centre (ICC) in Bangalore.
We’re combining innovation, automation and technology to solve the world’s biggest technological challenges in areas such as Internet of Things (IoT), 5G, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, and more.
Join us on this exciting journey, and together, we’ll reimagine the future.
Role with us
CPQ Technical Architect will work with business stakeholders and ITS colleagues in the implementation and support of Cloudsense CPQ at Telstra. This position offers diversity in projects, an opportunity to work in a team environment with autonomy and a high-level of responsibility. There are also excellent opportunities for professional growth and advancement within Telstra Customer Platforms and broader Telstra systems.
CPQ Technical Architect is responsible for leading technical CPQ low level architecture activities for Telstra across requirement analysis, design, development and implementation on Telstra’s key CRM platforms. They will be responsible for developing and coordinating technical delivery aspects of all Telstra’s CRM systems implementations, communicating effectively and fostering strong relationships with business users and stakeholders.
The purpose of the role is to take responsibility for ensuring all requests from the business are developed and delivered in the most optimal way taking into consideration business roadmaps, ITS CRM Strategy, industry best practice, vendor roadmaps and thought leadership and innovation delivering a competitive advantage to Telstra.
He will participate in and/or be responsible for technical analysis of functional designs, preparation of technical designs, technical build & implementation of CRM, CRM configuration and scripting, quality & code reviews, facilitating testing, resolution of defects identified during test, managing relationships between support and development team, mentoring and training
Key Accountabilities
Salesforce Technical Architect role is to plan, coordinate, and execute all activities related to the requirements interpretation, design and implementation of CPQ, CLM applications. This individual will apply proven industry and technology experience as well as communication skills, problem-solving skills, and knowledge of best practices to issues related to design, development, and deployment of mission-critical CRM systems with a focus on quality application development and delivery.
This role is key to the success of the Customer Platforms function at Telstra and will be responsible and accountable for the following:
Ability to design and develop Salesforce CRM, Cloudsense CPQ & Force.com Applications
Ability to review vendor designs and recommended solutions based on industry best practises
Ability to provide technical governance across Cloudsense CPQ solutions at Telstra
Assess and improve the efficiency and effectiveness of the Salesforce application solutions to ensure user requirements and business objectives are met in a timely and cost effective manner
Understand overall business operations and develops innovative solutions to help improve productivity
Ability to understand and design provisioning solutions at Telstra and how CRM interacts with provisioning layers.
Strong problem solving and analytical skills needed to support enterprise high availability Salesforce applications
Coordinate with technical resource within and outside of Customer Platforms team.
Monitor process of software configuration/development/testing to assure quality deliverable.
Ensure standards of QA are being met
Review deliverables to verify that they meet client and contract expectations; Implement and enforce high standards for quality deliverables
Analyses performance and capacity issues of the highest complexity with Salesforce application.
Demonstrate thought Leadership in Cloudsense CPQ innovations and practices.
Assists leadership with development and management of new application capabilities to improve productivity
Provide training and educate other team members around core capabilities and helps them deliver high quality solutions and deliverables/documentation
Self-Motivator to perform Design / Develop user requirements, test and deploy the changes into production
Skill & Experience : 12 + yrs
SFDC, APEX, Conga, Appttus, Cloudsense
Technical Descriptors
Salesforce – Service Cloud, Sales Cloud, Force. Com platform
Salesforce Certified Developer / Advanced Developer / Technical Architect is essential
Experience in building applications on force.com platform with extensive hands-on and subject matter expertise in Salesforce technology including
Full cycle implementation experience with SFDC (application design, architecture and development using Salesforce.com)
Strong SFDC knowledge and Integration components for SFDC (SFDC APIs, Apex controllers, Apex Web Services, Apex callout, outbound messaging, SFDC data loaders, etc.)
Command over APEX and Visual force
Hands on experience in building salesforce apex classes, test classes and deployment process.
Deep knowledge of Salesforce API’s and hands on experience in building custom API’s and integration.
Working knowledge of web frameworks – HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JSON, Ajax
working knowledge of all Atlassian tools a bonus
Expertise in developing CPQ capability using Cloudsense.
Proven experience of working with Telco Clients to configure products, Baskets, Order Orchestration and Technical Enrichment.
Certifications in Appttus and Conga would be essential.
Expertise in developing Contract management solution integrating into CPQ using Conga or Appttus
Proven experience with creation of relevant documentation including, but not limited to Apttus CPQ solution design document and requirements documentation
Experience with migration of CPQ across environments including experience with the Apttus migration tool
Knowledge of the fundamental capabilities of Apttus CPQ including but not limited to:
Quoting and Quote Templates
Approvals (Deal Manager/IWA preferred)
X- Author
Fundamental understanding of Apttus CLM capabilities, Apttus CLM 201 certification a plus
Experience with Apttus Advanced Workflow Approvals
Experience with X-Author for Excel and Contracts
Experience with Apttus Wizard
Familiar with Apttus admin settings, Apttus custom settings and DocuSign settings.
Knowledge of Apttus development
Why Join us
Our people in India will be at the forefront of technological change as they work collaboratively with, and learn from, world-class experts and have access to the latest training programs and insights for their field.
Alongside your work on leading edge projects, working with us means you'll have access to company perks and benefits that'll reward you for the great work you do. We’re growing, fast, and for you that means many exciting opportunities to develop your career with us at Telstra.
We’re committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce. To enable everyone to participate, we’ve developed an ‘All Roles Flex’ policy to consider flexible ways of working for every role. To learn more, visit tel.st/allrolesflex

Title: Senior DevOps Engineer
Description:
Senior DevOps Engineer

Job Description:

At Micro Focus, everything we do is based on a simple idea: The fastest way to get results is to build on what you have. Our software solutions enable organizations to do just that. Secure and scalable, with analytics built in, they bridge the gap between existing and emerging IT—fast-tracking digital transformations across DevOps, Hybrid IT, Security, and Predictive Analytics. In the race to innovate, Micro Focus customers have the clear advantage.
Our portfolio spans the following areas
DevOps | IT Operations| Cloud | Security | Info Governance | Big Data, Machine Learning, & Analytics
Product Brief
Join a passionate and seasoned team in Micro Focus that is focused on delivering enterprise ready software for IT Operations Management with great user experience and analytics built-in. This role is the R&D Engineering Development Manager for Network Operations Management product. The team is innovating on the latest network technologies and software development processes to bring differentiated, integrated and unique capabilities to customers. The solution consists of capabilities such as network fault monitoring, change and configuration, network performance monitoring, and network automation.
Included in the job is the maintenance of products in the portfolio such as Network Node Manager (NNMi), Network Automation (NA), and Network Smart Plug-Ins, as well as their evolution into the new Network Operations Management suite. Micro Focus (formerly HP/E Software) – network management offering is the industry leader in the network fault monitoring space and the network change, configuration, and compliance management space; with a strong install base from the Fortune 2000 list. The Performance iSPIs and Advanced Services iSPIs add additional capabilities in Metrics, Traffic, Quality of Service, MPLS, IP Multicast and IP Telephony.
Analyzes, designs, programs, debugs, and modifies software enhancements and/or new products used in local, networked, or Internet- related computer programs, primarily for end users. Using current programming language and technologies, writes code, completes programming, and performs testing and debugging of applications. Completes documentation and procedures for installation and maintenance. May interact with users to define system requirements and/or necessary modifications.
Responsibilities
Experienced working in Agile/Scrum development process
Strong automation experience in build, test, configuration and deployment in development to production environments
Very good with one or more programming languages – Java, Go Lang, JavaScript, Python etc.
Very good with scripting using Bash, Python etc.
Knowledgeable about developing applications utilizing micro service architecture
Knowledgeable about Docker and Kubernetes
Very good with SQL, database fundamentals and having a good understanding of one or more databases such as Oracle, Postgres, MSSQL etc.

Title: Software-Senior Engineer(DEVOPS Product owner)
Description:

Telstra is Australia’s leading telecommunications and technology company, with operations in more than 20 countries, including in India where we’re building a new Innovation and Capability Centre (ICC) in Bangalore.
We’re combining innovation, automation and technology to solve the world’s biggest technological challenges in areas such as Internet of Things (IoT), 5G, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, and more.
Role with us:
To create a brilliant connected future for everybody through the delivery of high quality software solutions.
Successful candidates will be experienced Senior Technology Specialists possessing strong problem solving skills, a self-starter mindset with a proactive attitude towards delivery and leadership capabilities in order to provide technical guidance to other Software Engineers.
Technical Product owner is responsible for laying out vision for implementing DEVOPS i..e CI/CD, Automation Testing, TDD, Monitoring across SaaS and IaaS platforms on AWS and Azure
Key Accountabilities:
Technical Product Owner would be responsible for laying out the vision and blueprints and bring it to reality with a DevSecOps view.
Identify industry best practices and standards for implementation of Cloud.
Guide engineers and developers in following best practices and standards and cross train them on cloud technology.
Complying with all relevant processes and standards, including change management principles and processes to ensure deliverables meet or exceed defined quality standards.

DEVOPS, CI/CD, Agile, Bamboo, Jenkins, AWS, Azzure, Git, Bitbucket, Docker, Virtualisation, Monitoring, Teraform, Product Management, Agile

7+ years of experience with AWS Cloud with understanding of AWS platform, service offerings and billing.
AWS CloudFormation templates, AWS EC2, VPC and Subnets, S3, ELB/ALB.
Experience in high level design and architectures of networks, servers, infrastructure and other systems for various models such as IaaS, SaaS, PaaS etc.

Working experience in a DevOps environment with the team and other stakeholders.

Why Join us
Our people in India will be at the forefront of technological change as they work collaboratively with, and learn from, world-class experts and have access to the latest training programs and insights for their field.
Alongside your work on leading edge projects, working with us means you'll have access to company perks and benefits that'll reward you for the great work you do. We’re growing, fast, and for you that means many exciting opportunities to develop your career with us at Telstra.
We’re committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce. To enable everyone to participate, we’ve developed an ‘All Roles Flex’ policy to consider flexible ways of working for every role. To learn more, visit tel.st/allrolesflex

Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description:
Who we are
Fueled by a fundamental belief that having access to financial services creates opportunity, PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL) is committed to democratizing financial services and empowering people and businesses to join and thrive in the global economy. Our open digital payments platform gives PayPal’s 277 million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways, whether they are online, on a mobile device, in an app, or in person. Through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships, PayPal creates better ways to manage and move money, and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments, paying or getting paid. Available in more than 200 markets around the world, the PayPal platform, including Braintree, Venmo and Xoom, enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than 100 currencies, withdraw funds in 56 currencies and hold balances in their PayPal accounts in 25 currencies.
When applying for a job you are required to create an account, if you have already created account - click Sign In.
Creating an account will allow you to follow the progress of your applications.
Note:
Provide full legal first Name/Family Name
DO: Capitalize first letter of First and Last Name. Example: John Smith
DON'T: Capitalize entire First and/or Last Name. Example: JOHN SMITH
NOTE: Use correct grammar for Names with multiple cases. Example: McDonald or O'Connell
Provide full address details
Resume is required
Multiple attachments can be uploaded including Resume and Cover Letter for each application

Job Description Summary:
At PayPal, we believe that now is the time to democratize financial services so that moving and managing money is a right for all citizens, not just the affluent. We are driven by this purpose, and we uphold our cultural values of collaboration, innovation, wellness and inclusion as our guide for making decisions and conducting business every day. It is our duty and privilege to be customer champions and put those we serve at the center of everything we do.

We are one team that respects and values diversity of thought for everyone, everywhere, and we actively seek to create an energizing workplace that brings out the best in all of us. If you are ready to shape the future of money, join the team at PayPal. We are proud to work here. You will be too.

Technology Platforms & Experiences (TPX) organization is the technology engine that powers PayPal’s business. We deliver a seamlessly scalable, exceptionally efficient, highly reliable infrastructure and services platform in a hybrid cloud environment. Thousands of PayPal developers build and run hundreds of applications processing billions of calls daily with high availability and reliability on our Java middleware framework products. As a team, we are active in the open source community, are proud of our systems knowledge, technology breadth, and intellectual curiosity. We are driven to empower PayPal developers in the best way possible.

PayPal seeks a self-driven, team player to join its Developer Platforms & Experiences (DPX) team. In this role, you’ll be an integral part of the developer experience team, working directly with Engineers, Architects, Product Managers, Program Managers and stakeholders to enable PayPal Dev workload on public clouds.

Primary responsibilities:

Work on in house applications written in Java, Node.js and Go.
You have a passion for building great developer experiences and have high energy and are capable of thriving in a high-paced and fun work environment.
You will be primarily responsible for building the infrastructure that is highly available and scalable.
You will utilize your experience and work in cloud technologies such as Docker, Mesos , Aurora, Hadoop/Storm, developer tools such as Jenkins and proprietary technologies to build the next generation of PayPal Development pipeline and build systems.
You will help pick machine learning algorithms to create smart metrics that will guide current and future investments.
Job Description:
A successful candidate will a strong engineer who is able to work in a high performing team, can creatively balance high quality delivery with customer focus to meet business needs, has excellent communication skills, and continuous record of delivering results in an aggressive and fast paced environment.
6+ years of experience planning, designing, developing and delivering software related to platforms
Hands on experience with design and development of scalable web services and platforms
Strong experience in some of the following technologies is highly desirable: Jenkins, Docker, Mesos, Aurora, Kubernetes, Hadoop/Storm/Spark, Java, Go, Node.js, MongoDB, Machine Learning and scripting
Understanding and experience with storage technologies such as NFS, Cinder,Swift, EBS and EFS is desirable.
Prior experience in building infrastructure for instrumenting, reporting, monitoring and alerting
Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to present complex technical information in a clear and concise manner to a variety of audiences.
Prior experience in AWS, GCE or Azure is a definite plus
BS in Computer Science or equivalent

COMPANY DESCRIPTION
SAP started in 1972 as a team of five colleagues with a desire to do something new. Together, they changed enterprise software and reinvented how business was done. Today, as a market leader in enterprise application software, we remain true to our roots. That’s why we engineer solutions to fuel innovation, foster equality and spread opportunity for our employees and customers across borders and cultures.
SAP values the entrepreneurial spirit, fostering creativity and building lasting relationships with our employees. We know that a diverse and inclusive workforce keeps us competitive and provides opportunities for all. We believe that together we can transform industries, grow economics, lift up societies and sustain our environment. Because it’s the best-run businesses that make the world run better and improve people’s lives.
JOB TITLE: Developer - Cloud HCM Analytics Team
PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES:
At SAP SuccessFactors we have started a Human Revolution. Using the latest technology, we are unlocking human potential and transforming our customer’s workforces in ways they never imagined. We are digitally transforming their businesses into the next generation of intelligent enterprises. Because people are at the heart of every business transformation and people are the heart of our business. The SAP SuccessFactors product suite spans core human resources and payroll, analytics-based hiring and customized onboarding, continuous performance management, intelligent succession and more. We operate the largest HCM Cloud in the world, supporting over 120 million users with over a billion transactions for customers across 26 industries in over 90 countries. Our co-located agile teams have end-to-end ownership of product, design, development, release, user assistance, and cloud operations capabilities. We are looking for the best talent to join our team and deliver continuous innovations in the cloud while bringing purpose to their lives and more meaning to their work. Join us today and become a part of the Human Revolution.
ABOUT THE TEAM
The Cloud HCM Analytics team builds the analytics solution on top of world’s biggest cloud-based enterprise application which has unique challenge in building a common solution that should be customizable for more than 4,450 across 60 industries in over 177 countries and scalable for 50 million users usage. We are responsible for building operational reporting solutions, as well as cutting edge analytical solutions. This team provides ample opportunities to interact with various stake holders and come of the best solution and implement the same with support for highly customizable and scalable approach. Current development activities involved in make use of Predictive Analytics, Machine learning and Artificial Intelligence. We have ambitious road map to start working on Prescriptive analytics.
Position Overview
Developers should be able to work as a Full stack developer with specialized either in UI or back end. Design highly scalable and performant solution which address functional as well as nonfunctional requirement with high quality.
Full stack developer – willing and capable of handling both client and server development
End to end responsibility – take care of your feature from requirements to deployment
Collaborate well – demonstrate excellent development practices, share and motivate others.
This development role provides immense potential for growth. The potential candidate would work closely with other members of the team and other functional groups within SAP SuccessFactors
SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES
Strong technical skills with technologies like Java/J2EE, Hibernate, Spring, SAP HANA, UI Technologies and OData protocols to develop modem cutting edge software that performs and scales in cloud environment
Server oriented - Knowledge in Java backend development (tomcat, JEE, dependency injection, and more) – mandatory
At least basic client-side knowledge of Web technologies, JS, HTML, CSS – mandatory.
Sound knowledge in Object Oriented Programming Principles, Design Patterns and Software Architecture, especially in new age Cloud solutions
Must be able to design and implement across all layers of the software (UI, Backend, Database)
Exposure to debugging, troubleshooting and performance tuning for complex SQL queries
Knowledge of lean development infrastructure process including Git, TeamCity, Jenkins etc. and exposure to Continuous Delivery practices
Exposure to building Analytical and report modelling for highly customizable Enterprise cloud-based SaaS application
Working knowledge of Scrum, Test Driven Development and passionate about unit test, integrity testing, stress testing and performance testing and test automation
Exposure to building large scale application deployed on public cloud like AWS, AZURE etc ..
EDUCATION, WORK EXPERIENCE AND QUALIFICATIONS
BE/B.Tech, ME/M.Tech, MCA with 60% aggregate across.
Strong educational qualifications (Engineering majors, MCA from reputed institutes)
4-8 years of professional experience in developing Java/J2EE based enterprise web-based application,
Outstanding written and verbal communication skills.
Bachelor’s in Computer Science required, Master preferred.
#SAPSFSF

WHAT YOU GET FROM US
Success is what you make it. At SAP, we help you make it your own. A career at SAP can open many doors for you. If you’re searching for a company that’s dedicated to your ideas and individual growth, recognizes you for your unique contributions, fills you with a strong sense of purpose, and provides a fun, flexible and inclusive work environment – apply now.
SAP'S DIVERSITY COMMITMENT
To harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the unique competencies that each person brings to the company.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Overview
HP Engineering entails utilizing established engineering disciplines to test and safeguard the manufacturing standards for new and existing HP products. Working with internal stakeholders and outsourced development partners, you will develop and execute solutions to resolve any existing issues, ensuring that our operating processes are cost-effective and uphold the highest quality.
Full Time
